org.apache.karaf.bundle.core

Interface BundleStateService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlueprintStateService, ScrBundleStateService, SpringStateService

    public interface BundleStateService
    SPI to track an extended bundle state for injection frameworks like blueprint that also reports on dependencies and status on the injection container level

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String NAME_BLUEPRINT 
      static java.lang.String NAME_DS 
      static java.lang.String NAME_SPRING_DM 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDiag(Bundle bundle)
      Give a textual report about the details of a bundle status like missing namespace handlers or service dependencies.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Name of the framework the implementation supports.
      BundleState getState(Bundle bundle)
      Report the bundle state from the framework point of view.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Name of the framework the implementation supports. Should return one of the NAME_ constants above if it matches
        Returns:
        name of the framework

      • getDiag

        java.lang.String getDiag(Bundle bundle)
        Give a textual report about the details of a bundle status like missing namespace handlers or service dependencies. Should also give the details if there are config errors
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle to get diag for.
        Returns:
        diagnostic details.

      • getState

        BundleState getState(Bundle bundle)
        Report the bundle state from the framework point of view. If the framework is not active it should return Unknown.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle to get state for.
        Returns:
        the current bundle state.
